com.att.aro.model
Class ProfileWiFi

java.lang.Object
  com.att.aro.model.Profile
      com.att.aro.model.ProfileWiFi
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ProfileWiFi
extends Profile

Represents a device profile for modeling WiFi energy states when analyzing trace data.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static java.lang.String POWER_WIFI_ACTIVE
          The average amount of power (in watts) that should be used when WiFi is in the Active state.

          The average amount of power (in watts) that should be used when WiFi is in the Standby state.

Method Detail

energy

public double energy(double time1,
                     double time2,
                     RRCState state,
                     java.util.List<PacketInfo> packets)
A utility method for calculating RRC energy for WiFi. Implements the energy method in the Profile base class.

Specified by:
energy in class Profile
Parameters:
time1 - A beginning time value.
time2 - An ending time value.
state - An RRCState enumeration value that indicates the RRC energy state.
packets - A List of packets that were passed during the specified time period. The packet information may be used in determining the amount of energy used.
Returns:
The energy consumed in the specified RRC state.

getProfileType

public ProfileType getProfileType()
Returns the type of profile. Subclasses of this class must identify the profile type.

Specified by:
getProfileType in class Profile
Returns:
The profile type. One of the values of the ProfileType enumeration.

getWifiTailTime

public double getWifiTailTime()
Returns the amount of time that WiFi was in the Tail state.

Returns:
The amount of WiFi tail time.

getWifiActivePower

public double getWifiActivePower()
Returns the amount of energy consumed when WiFi is in the Active state.

Returns:
The amount of WiFi Active energy.

getWifiIdlePower

public double getWifiIdlePower()
Returns the amount of energy consumed when WiFi is in the Idle state.

Returns:
The amount of WiFi Idle energy.
